

0/3 (comp - D3D12): compute






0/3 (comp - Vulkan): compute






0/3 (comp - Metal): compute




1/3 (vert - D3D12): display

1/3 (frag - D3D12): display





1/3 (vert - Vulkan): display

1/3 (frag - Vulkan): display





1/3 (vert - Metal): display

1/3 (frag - Metal): display





2/3 (vert - D3D12): profile

2/3 (frag - D3D12): profile





2/3 (vert - Vulkan): profile

2/3 (frag - Vulkan): profile
